unnormalised: The Income Tax Dept. has extended the deadline for filing ITR for AY 2024-25 to 31/07/2024. Taxpayers are advised to file their returns on time to avoid late filing penalties u/s 234F of the Income Tax Act, 1961. Experts suggest using Form 26AS to reconcile income and TDS details before filing.
normalised: The Income Tax Department has extended the deadline for filing I-T-R for A-Y two thousand twenty four two thousand twenty five to thirty first july two thousand twenty four. Taxpayers are advised to file their returns on time to avoid late filing penalties under section two hundred thirty four F of the Income Tax Act, nineteen sixty one. Experts suggest using Form twenty six A-S to reconcile income and T-D-S details before filing.

unnormalised: Individuals with income exceeding Rs. 2.5 lakh are required to file their income tax returns. This includes salaried employees, business owners, and freelancers. Different ITR forms are applicable based on the source of income. For example, ITR-1 is for individuals with income from salary, one house property, and other sources, while ITR-3 is for those with business income. Remember, the tax slabs vary based on the chosen tax regime.
normalised: Individuals with income exceeding rupee two point five lakh are required to file their income tax returns. This includes salaried employees, business owners, and freelancers. Different I-T-R forms are applicable based on the source of income. For example, I-T-R one is for individuals with income from salary, one house property, and other sources, while I-T-R three is for those with business income. Remember, the tax slabs vary based on the chosen tax regime.

unnormalised: Failure to file ITR by the due date can result in a penalty of up to Rs. 5,000. It's recommended to gather all necessary documents, such as Form 16, bank statements, and investment proofs, well in advance. Consult a tax professional or use online tax filing platforms for assistance. Keep in mind that even if your tax liability is nil, filing ITR can be beneficial for loan applications and visa processing.
